attributes.action: Give Merv Pepler and Joie Hinton a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Come on people who wants to see the Eat Static boys with a knighthood for their contribution to British music.
If Elton John got a knighthood then why not Merv and Joie.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
